PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DiscreteAccessoryFixingSocket
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: Properties common to fixing sockets.

PropertyDef.Name: FixingSocketTypeReference
PropertyDef.Definition: Type reference for the fixing socket according to local standards.

PropertyDef.Name: FixingSocketHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The overall height of the fixing socket.

PropertyDef.Name: FixingSocketThreadDiameter
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal diameter of the thread.

PropertyDef.Name: FixingSocketThreadLength
PropertyDef.Definition: The length of the threaded part of the fixing socket.
